duties_responsibilities.duty: Deploy product updates, identify production issues, and implement integrations to meet client needs.
Research and conduct Proof-of-Concept testing for new technologies.
Automate solutions for internal and external teams, and serve as technical engineer in the analysis, design, and implementation of various projects and initiatives.
Implement new systems, upgrades, and modifications, including planning, testing, coordinating, and scheduling.
Ensure change management and defined security procedures for all assigned systems are executed in accordance with client policies and procedures.
Minimize client service interruptions through early identification and resolution of problems.
Create, manage, and use dashboards for continuous monitoring and health check of applications and infrastructure.

Contribute to the improvement of software delivery processes and operations, and monitor comprehensive data warehouse systems to balance optimization of data access with batch loading and resource utilization factors.
Co-ordinate with Auditors and stakeholders on Sox and CPNI compliance requests, and provide guidance to DevOps teams on compliance and security.
Provide guidance on associated process and roles/responsibility for solution and remediation.

education_certification.credential: B.S. in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field (Master's preferred)
